description:
Still unable to write lyrics for Hayasaka`s song, the members of WUG are repeatedly told to try again.
The deadline for their album release is coming up, but they`re still one step short.
Miyu and Kaya head to a certain group`s concert where they strengthen their friendship with the other group.
Will the lyrics they`re inspired to write as a result be good enough...?
Source: crunchyroll
